The researcher, if the graves, have been stubborn, the dirt, which he urged to die, was removed, and the one who was buried in it was buried in it, so it was pleased with it, and it is not the same, and it is not the same.Determination of dust and its parts; It is only for the exaggeration of something under which it is mentioned and it is intended with its meaning and its necessity with it, and it has what you heard.It may be permitted to be brought up from the resurrection and the latter, as in the orders, where it is supported in it because of the graves without it, as it is here, and some of the people were blessed, and the one who is blessed is the one who is blessed, The imams are like the time and the Sahili that it is composed of two words, and it is called a sculpture, and the origin of the “stumbling” is a source, and the ritual, He was lost and bored; That is, he said in the name of God and praise be to God, the Exalted, no power, and no power, except with God Almighty and God Almighty has perpetuated His glory, so that it is other than that of the wounds, and it is a lot of people.Burning and lagging together, and Abu Hayyan exposed it to the fact that the pioneering is not one of the righteousness of Ziadah, and it is an illusion of it; It is a difference between the installation and the sculptures of two words and the leadership of some of the forefathers from one word, as it was separated in the flower, from the enemy, The original is the prestige.
